A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pros: - Solid acting all around\, especially by Mark Hamill\, Adam Driver\, and Donhnall Gleason. - Very interesting dynamic between Rey and Kylo Ren - Beautiful cinematography Cons: - Sloppy script and dialogue - Too much teasing and not enough payoff many times. What did the Jedi do wrong? Who is Rey? Who is Snoke? NO new information regarding Star Wars lore. - Zero reason to have Finn\, Rose\, DJ\, or any of the Canto Bite scenes at all. Forced in a pointless plot line just to have a confrontation between Phasma and Finn.
